question_text: Which of the following are true about antenna placement and wiring in laptops? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Wi-Fi antennas are usually routed through the laptop lid
Antenna wires are often connected to the hard drive
Display disassembly often reveals the antenna wiring
Wireless cards typically connect to main and auxiliary antenna wires
correct_answer: Wi-Fi antennas are usually routed through the laptop lid
Display disassembly often reveals the antenna wiring
Wireless cards typically connect to main and auxiliary antenna wires
explanation: Laptop antennas are routed through the display bezel for better elevation, and wireless cards connect to both main and auxiliary leads.
